feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle may allow students to bypass sequential navigation during a quiz attempt
entry.content:
In Moodle, insufficient limitations in some quiz web services made it possible for students to bypass sequential navigation during a quiz attempt.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-40208
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=438761
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/025e0297b65e6a8bd61efad0fdf36168c613f918
  • https://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git;a=commitdiff;h=025e0297b65e6a8bd61efad0fdf36168c613f918
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-948f-j464-rfj2

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle may display roles to users who don't have access to them
entry.content:
The course participation report required additional checks to prevent roles being displayed which the user did not have access to view.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1402
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=445069
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/f0a557bffbdb450648d0e4cedb391d14d8a0a253
  • https://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git;a=commitdiff;h=f0a557bffbdb450648d0e4cedb391d14d8a0a253
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-vj5p-fp42-774p

entry.title: [notrinos/notrinos-erp] NotrinosERP vulnerable to SQL Injection
entry.content:
NotrinosERP v0.7 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the OrderNumber parameter at /NotrinosERP/sales/customer_delivery.php.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-24788
  • https://github.com/arvandy/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2023-24788/CVE-2023-24788.md
  • https://github.com/arvandy/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2023-24788/CVE-2023-24788.py
  • https://github.com/arvandy/CVE/blob/main/NotrinosERP/POC.md
  • https://github.com/notrinos/NotrinosERP
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4pqp-69m3-f8pp

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle may allow authenticated users to enumerate other user's names via learning plans page
entry.content:
Authenticated users were able to enumerate other users' names via the learning plans page.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-28334
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=445066
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/0e3c8eb740e1e49a62a5f452cda7e06258712bbf
  • https://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git;a=commit;h=0e3c8eb740e1e49a62a5f452cda7e06258712bbf
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hh52-g5c4-wprh

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle's Mustache pix helper contained a potential Mustache injection risk if combined with user input
entry.content:
The Mustache pix helper contained a potential Mustache injection risk if combined with user input (note: This did not appear to be implemented/exploitable anywhere in the core Moodle LMS).

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-28333
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=445065
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/128c0c21607a71f411611a0104b2a8c858dd6fca
  • https://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git;a=commitdiff;h=128c0c21607a71f411611a0104b2a8c858dd6fca
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-q2x3-2f9g-h559

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting when algebra filter enabled but not functional
entry.content:
If the algebra filter was enabled but not functional (eg the necessary binaries were missing from the server), it presented an XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-28332
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=445064
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/9f178c1f816e78ec024ab16a10192c81305b2624
  • https://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git;a=commitdiff;h=9f178c1f816e78ec024ab16a10192c81305b2624
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9f45-9qrw-pp4v

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting when algebra filter enabled but not functional
entry.content:
If the algebra filter was enabled but not functional (eg the necessary binaries were missing from the server), it presented an XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-28332
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=445064
